en: Organisation of tours (free, accompanied, in groups, half-day or full-day tours) with various other services (introduction to wine-tasting, gastronomic catering, stops at local markets and craft markets, visits to remarkable sites, etc.). Accompanied tasting tours: history of Languedoc wine-growing, visits to estates, wine-tasting sessions, etc.).The proposed formulas :PASSPORT DISCOVERY, You choose among all the destinations, we prepare for you the whole road book (road maps, addresses and contact details of the estates, tourist places to discover).ESSENTIAL PASSPORT, In a half day, ViniBalades will drive you, in one of its vehicles, and accompany you to two or three producers. TASTING PASSPORT, For a full day, you will be driven, in one of our vehicles, by our guide to discover the wine-producing wonders of Languedoc-Roussillon. Lunch to be provided.PRESTIGE Passport, "top-of-the-range" version of the Tasting Passport, with an introduction to wine tasting, meal in a gourmet restaurant.GROUP Passport, a college meal is included in this passport. The Group Passport includes a college meal and an estimate on request.Customized wine tourism and personalized passport.Passeport TERROIR, On one morning, accompanied by our guide, to meet a winemaker and his farm. A minimum of 8 persons is required.
fr: Organisation de circuits (libre, accompagné, en groupe, à la 1/2 journée ou à la journée) agrémentés de diverses autres prestations (initiation à la dégustation, restauration gastronomique, arrêts sur des marchés locaux/artisanaux, visites de sites remarquables...Balades-dégustations accompagnées : historique de la viticulture languedocienne, visites de domaines, séances dégustations ...Les formules proposées :Passeport DÉCOUVERTE, Vous choisissez parmi toutes les destinations, nous préparons pour vous l'intégralité du carnet de route (cartes routières, adresses et coordonnées des domaines, lieux touristiques à découvrir).Passeport ESSENTIEL, En une 1/2 journée, ViniBalades vous conduira, à bord de l'un de ses véhicules, et vous accompagnera chez deux ou trois producteurs.Passeport DÉGUSTATION, Pendant une journée complète, vous allez être conduits, dans l'un de nos véhicules, par notre guide accompagnateur pour découvrir les merveilles viticoles du Languedoc-Roussillon. Repas du midi à prévoir.Passeport PRESTIGE, Version "haut de gamme" du passeport Dégustation, avec une initiation à la dégustation, repas dans un restaurant gastronomique.Passeport GROUPE, un repas collégial est inclus dans ce passeport. Devis sur demande.Oenotourisme sur mesure et Passeport personnalisé.Passeport TERROIR, Sur une matinée, accompagnés de notre guide, à la rencontre d'un vigneron et de son exploitation. Un minimum de 8 personnes est requis.

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:logo: https://www.tourismegard.com/Portals/2/Market-place/Le portail des pros du tourisme du Gard_fichiers/logo-Gard-Tourisme.jpg

en:
Organisation of tours (free, accompanied, in groups, half-day or full-day) enhanced by various other services (introduction to wine tasting, gastronomic catering, stops at local markets/crafts, visits to remarkable sites, etc.). Accompanied wine tasting tours: history of Languedoc winegrowing, visits to estates, tasting sessions, etc.
The formulas proposed :DISCOVERY Passport, You choose among all the destinations, we prepare for you the entire road book (road maps, addresses and contact details of the estates, tourist places to discover).Passport ESSENTIEL, In half a day, ViniBalades will drive you in one of its vehicles and accompany you to two or three wine producers.Passport DÉGUSTATION, For a full day, you will be driven in one of our vehicles by our guide to discover the wine wonders of Languedoc-Roussillon. PRESTIGE Passport, A "top of the range" version of the Tasting Passport, with an introduction to wine tasting, a meal in a gastronomic restaurant.GROUP Passport, a group meal is included in this passport. Tailor-made wine tourism and personalized passport.Passport TERROIR, On a morning, accompanied by our guide, to meet a winegrower and his farm. A minimum of 8 people is required.
